short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: F-Lingo helps you learn about selected words, phrases, and concepts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: F-Lingo works on top of FutureLearn to help you learn about selected words, phrases, and concepts in the text you're reading. Implemented as a Chrome Extension, it is part of a research project on language learning at the University of Waikato, New Zealand.
